resources.string: appadas
The joke question will be displayed here
The joke answer will be displayed here
Tell another joke
Why is the spider the neediest animal in the world?
Because it’s an arachneedyou.
Why doesn’t the pine tree get lost in the forest?
Because it has a pine-cone (compass).
What did a pagode singer go do in church?
He went to sing PÁ GOD.
Why was Napoleon always invited to parties?
Because he was GOOD NA PARTY.
Who is the king of cheeses?
The “reiqueijão” (cream king/cheese).
Why doesn’t the old lady wear a watch?
Because she’s a señora (senhora).
When did Americans eat meat for the first time?
When Christopher “Com Lombo” arrived.
Why did the computer go to the doctor?
Because it had a virus.
What’s the oldest animal in the world?
The zebra, because it’s still in black and white.
Why did the book go to the gym?
Because it wanted to gain more volume.
What did zero say to eight?
Nice belt!
Why is the pencil always calm?
Because it has a fine point.
What’s the height of sleepiness?
Sleeping with your eyes open.
Why did the tomato go to the bank?
To get a statement (extract).
